DESCRIPTION:

In Driver - you are the Wheelman!?. Grab the wheel - Welcome to the criminal underworld. You&#039;re a cop named Tanner and you&#039;re undercover - deep cover. Posing as a getaway driver for hire, you&#039;ll be ripping it up through the mean streets of the wildest urban jungles: New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, and Miami. Tailing unsuspecting victims. Picking up "shipments." And, of course, getting away from the big heists. You&#039;ll be doing it all (and then some) if you wanna make the big bust. The only things you need to leave behind are a trail of blown red lights, dazed pedestrians, and burnt-out cop cars! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
